sourceText: Make sure you will not be interrupted. Switch off the TV and give your full attention to your child while setting aside other things for now. Put your phone on silent. It will show your child, they are important.
text: Make sure you will not be interrupted. Switch off the TV and give your full attention to your child while setting aside other things for now. Put your phone on silent. It will show your child, they are important.
note: This is for topic One-on-One Time - Children

sourceText: Choosing builds their self-confidence. If they want to do something that isn’t OK with COVID-19 rules, then this is a chance to talk with them about this. If your child cannot think of anything, you can give them a choice of a couple things that you know they like, like reading a book or building blocks together.
text: Choosing builds their self-confidence. If they want to do something that isn’t OK with COVID-19 rules, then this is a chance to talk with them about this. If your child cannot think of anything, you can give them a choice of a couple things that you know they like, like reading a book or building blocks together.
note: This is for topic One-on-One Time - Children

sourceText: Today's Parenting Tip is all about Praise. We all appreciate it when the good things we do are recognised by others, especially when it is someone who is close to us.
text: Today's Parenting Tip is all about Praise. We all appreciate it when the good things we do are recognised by others, especially when it is someone who is close to us.

sourceText: 2. Make your household rules clear, positive and specific.
text: 2. Make your household rules clear, positive and specific.
note: This is for topic Household Rules

sourceText: 5. Praise and simple rewards such as a hug and a kiss can help support your child in following a household rule.
text: 5. Praise and simple rewards such as a hug and a kiss can help support your child in following a household rule.
note: This is for topic Household Rules

sourceText: Having a tantrum is difficult for your child too. As soon as your child has calmed down, involve them in a positive activity. You can talk about what happened later, but right now your child needs love.
text: Having a tantrum is difficult for your child too. As soon as your child has calmed down, involve them in a positive activity. You can talk about what happened later, but right now your child needs love.
note: This is for topic When Children Misbehave - Part 3 Ignore
